languages.text: All creatures, excluding Necrons, machines, or Inquisition agents, in a 3-cell radius around this creature suffer −20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} and −20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.

traits.locale_text: All creatures that are not necrons, machines, or blanks (pariahs) in a 3-cell radius around this creature suffer −20 Willpower and −20 Fellowship.

languages.text: ネクロン、機械、異端審問庁（インクィジション）を除く、この生物の周囲3セル以内のすべての生物は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が-20、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が-20される。

languages.text: Bu yaratığın çevresindeki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan Nekron, makine ve Engizisyon ajanı harici tüm yaratıklar; −20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} ve −20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliğine maruz kalırlar.
